message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality. What do you think?
I think the product is a bit pricey at $180. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $180 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $150.  I'm confident you won't find a better deal for this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $150 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
